## Report workflow issue

If you found any issues when running this workflow, [report template issue here](https://github.com/Comfy-Org/workflow_templates/issues)

Poster Content Description

The visual focus is a macro shot of a premium vintage red wine bottle standing next to a crystal goblet filled with rich, ruby-red wine. To emphasize the "natural" and "healthy" themes, a cluster of fresh, plump purple grapes with droplets of morning dew and vibrant green vine leaves surrounds the base of the glass on a rustic, dark walnut wooden table. The background features a soft-focus view of a lush, sun-drenched vineyard rolling over hills in the distance, suggesting an organic origin and a connection to the earth.

Aesthetic Style Optimization

The image evokes a sense of "quiet luxury" and vitality. The lighting is warm and natural, mimicking the golden hour, which illuminates the wine in the glass to reveal its clarity and deep color. The color palette is sophisticated, combining deep burgundies, emerald greens, and warm wood tones with accents of gold sunlight. The texture focuses on the contrast between the smooth, cold glass, the organic skin of the grapes, and the rough grain of the wood, creating a tactile and immersive experience that feels both high-end and wholesome.

Poster Text

VINO VITALE
Pure Nature. True Nobility.
Est. 1924

Text Style and Position

The title "VINO VITALE" is rendered in a refined, high-contrast serif font (similar to Didot) with a metallic gold texture, implying elegance and prestige. It is positioned at the top center of the poster, floating in the negative space of the bright sky. The slogan "Pure Nature. True Nobility." appears in a smaller, elegant sans-serif font in white, placed discretely at the bottom right, balancing the composition without distracting from the visual of the wine.

Layout

The composition uses a shallow depth of field to keep the bottle, glass, and fresh grapes in sharp focus while blurring the vineyard background. The wine bottle and glass are positioned slightly off-center to the left, following the rule of thirds. The sunlight streams in from the upper right, drawing a diagonal line of light across the table that leads the eye to the text at the bottom. The layout prioritizes an open, airy feel to communicate health and purity.

**User Input:æ¼«å¨è‹±é›„å…¨å®¶ç¦**

A vibrant, cinematic family portrait featuring the entire Marvel superhero ensemble gathered in a dynamic, heroic pose â€” Captain America stands center-left with his shield raised high, Iron Man hovers slightly behind him in full armor emitting subtle golden energy trails, Spider-Man swings dynamically from above draped over their shoulders like a living web, Black Widow crouches to the right gripping her pistol while smiling confidently, Hulk looms powerfully at the far left towering over them all, Thor stands tall on the right holding Mjolnir aloft as lightning crackles around it; beneath each heroâ€™s feet is an emblematic symbol of their respective team or origin city subtly glowing against darkened ground that transitions into cosmic nebulae overhead.

The aesthetic style should evoke epic comic book artistry fused with modern digital illustration techniquesâ€”richly saturated colors contrasted by deep shadows cast across muscular forms under dramatic volumetric lighting, rendered with painterly textures reminiscent of oil paint strokes overlaid with metallic sheen highlights, using bold primary hues for heroesâ€™ costumes accented by neon cyberpunk glows where applicable, overall palette dominated by royal blue, crimson reds, gold accents, and electric purples radiating warmth yet intensity through atmospheric haze layered atop textured film grain overlay mimicking vintage movie posters.

Text elements must include exactly these phrases without alteration: â€œMARVEL HEROES FAMILYâ€ centered prominently in large uppercase letters spanning top third of poster frame, followed directly below by smaller italicized tagline â€œTOGETHER THEY DEFY THE UNIVERSE,â€ both aligned centrally with crisp white sans-serif font edged in thin black outline resembling engraved metal plates; additional text includes date stamp â€œJUNE 8TH â€“ WORLDWIDE PREMIEREâ€ positioned bottom-center in minimalistic stencil-style typeface colored silver-gray fading toward transparent edges, accompanied immediately underneath by venue name â€œTHEATERS EVERYWHEREâ€ printed in ultra-thin lowercase serif script barely visible unless highlighted via spotlight glow effect emerging from lower corners.

Typography specifications require main title rendered in heavy condensed slab serif exhibiting slight beveling along letterforms suggesting embossed stone texture paired with radiant inner illumination casting soft halos onto surrounding background space; subtitle employs delicate hand-drawn brushstroke vector typography styled after old-school animation scripts but enhanced digitally with micro-glow particles trailing off characters' ends; secondary textual components utilize monochrome minimalist display fonts designed specifically for readability even when placed within dense visual environments such as those near character silhouettes or overlapping action lines.

Layout composition prioritizes radial focus emanating outward from central cluster formed by
